excerpt: Enjoy a vegan twist on classic buffalo chicken with this spicy and delicious pizza featuring cauliflower as the star topping.

instructions.name: Crust
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C.
In a mixing bowl, combine flour, yeast and salt. Mix well.
Add olive oil and warm water to the dry mixture. Mix until dough forms.
Knead dough for 5 minutes on a floured surface.
Form dough into a ball and let it rest for 10 minutes.
Roll out the dough into a pizza base in the desired shape and size.
Place the pizza base on a baking sheet and bake it for 8 minutes.

instructions.name: Buffalo Cauliflower Topping
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C.
In a mixing bowl, whisk together flour, garlic powder and salt.
Add water to the dry mixture and whisk until a thick batter forms.
Add cauliflower florets to the batter and coat well.
Spread the cauliflower florets evenly on a baking sheet and bake for 20 minutes.
Remove from oven and coat the cauliflower florets with buffalo sauce.
Return the baking sheet to the oven and bake for an additional 5 minutes.

instructions.name: Pizza sauce
instructions: In a mixing bowl, whisk together crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, garlic powder, dried oregano, salt and black pepper.

instructions.name: Assemble Pizza
instructions: Spread pizza sauce on top of the pre-baked crust.
Sprinkle vegan cheese on top of the pizza sauce.
Add buffalo cauliflower florets on top of the cheese.
Sprinkle chopped green onions on top of the cauliflower florets.
Bake the pizza at 220°C for 10-15 minutes or until cheese is melted and crust is golden brown.
Garnish with chopped fresh parsley.
Slice and serve hot.
